uvi.description:
usb: musb: tusb6010: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.293 by commit 1ba7605856e05fa991d4654ac69e5ace66c767b9. For more details please see the references link.
